SELECT tb_cOrder.coNo,tb_cOrder.loginID,tb_cOrder.coDate,tb_cOrder.coDpsts,tb_product.prodName FROM tb_cOrder
LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product ON tb_product.prodNo=tb_cOrder.prodNo
AND tb_cOrder.coDpsts='0'
AND tb_cOrder.loginID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND tb_cOrder.coDate >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND tb_cOrder.coDate < DATE(#{endDate})+1
AND tb_product.prodName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND tb_cOrder.coDate >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND tb_cOrder.coDate < DATE(#{endDate})+1
GROUP BY tb_cOrder.coNo
ORDER BY tb_cOrder.coNo DESC
LIMIT #{startnum},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT tb_cOrder.coNo,tb_cOrder.loginID,tb_cOrder.coDate,tb_cOrder.coDpsts,tb_product.prodName FROM tb_cOrder LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_product ON tb_product.prodNo=tb_cOrder.prodNo
AND tb_cOrder.coDpsts='0'
AND tb_cOrder.loginID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND tb_cOrder.coDate >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND tb_cOrder.coDate < DATE(#{endDate})+1
AND tb_product.prodName LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
AND tb_cOrder.coDate >= DATE(#{startDate}) AND tb_cOrder.coDate < DATE(#{endDate})+1
GROUP BY tb_cOrder.coNo
ORDER BY tb_cOrder.coNo DESC ) tb_cOrder
